review: Fire tv stick is awesome I get to watch all of my favorite shows it has wwe network that's a big plus and I'm a prime member so I get to see movies and music 5 stars 6 if they had it
author: Mo

review: I thought being a prime member I would be able to download series and movies for free, but I have to pay for most things
author: Shari E. Jones

review: Just have it a short time. But so far happy with it. Would recommend
author: LOLETTE GONZALEZ

review: I've used the fire stick just aFew times and I'm impressed with the ease of both the set up and navigation of the device!
author: Bethany Westerfeldt

review: Very easy to use and lots of titles to choose from. The apps are a great way to see newer stuff, since the titles included with prime are mostly a few years old. Very easy to set up and operate with the included remote. Overall very happy and product met expectations.
author: Heather M

review: Awesome! Better than I ever imagined! So many great choices,  I down graded my cable package.  Definitely the best choice I've made so far this year.
author: Brenda Smiles

review: Best integration of Prime Video that I've found so far.
author: Brandon W

review: Easy to install.  Operates much like my Roku 2. I am very satisfied.  My 8 year old grandson picked up the remote and immediately began playing some Star Wars game that worked flawlessly.  Yet the remote is incredibly simple to use, only six buttons.
author: W.

review: It met all of my expectations Im thinking I can drop my cable now..
author: Hal Dalson
